text: Norma Rae is a 1979 American political drama movie directed by Martin Ritt and starring Sally Field, Beau Bridges, Ron Leibman, Pat Hingle, Barbara Baxley. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox and nominated for 4 Oscars and won 2 Oscars at the Academy Awards in 1980. ==Other websites== * * * * * Category:1979 drama movies Category:American drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Martin Ritt
title: Norma Rae
